results.title: Never Done: Women, Work and History
results.brief_description: ‘Never done: women, work and history’. Focuses on women in the workplace from the mid-1800s through to the 1970s including footage of the first women’s union (1882); industrialisation and factory work; the birth of the modern office worker (1890s); equal pay for equal work movement; WWI and WWII women in the workforce; trade-unionism and feminism.

results.title: Close to Slavery: Black Work in White History
results.brief_description: Comprehensively portrayed by the archival footage in this film is a harrowing history of a government policy forcing Aboriginal Australians to assimilate to the white definitions of education and work, mission stations, removal of Aboriginal children, forced labour often in deplorable conditions and exploitation.

results.creator_credit: AFTRS, Leesa Kahn and Darcy Yuille

results.title: Birthday boy
results.creator_credit: AFTRS, Andrew Gregory and Sejong Park
results.brief_description: Korea 1951 - little Manuk is playing on the streets of his village and dreaming of life at the front where his father is a soldier. He returns home to find a parcel on the doorstep and, thinking it is a birthday present, he opens it. But its contents will change his life.

results.title: Basilisk stare
results.creator_credit: Chryss Carr, Mis Kamieniak and AFTRS
results.brief_description:
A psychosexual drama which launches the viewer into the inner-space of the male psyche in order to depict the way the modern male constructs sex. The film excites and disturbs the viewer with the use of a split screen, which allows for the pitching of two images against each other in order to create a sense of both excitement and voyeuristic curiosity.
Cast includes David Wenham, Amy Pedersen and Jared Turner

results.title: Surface tension
results.creator_credit: AFTRS, Karena Slaninka and Moira Moss
results.brief_description: Freida has something to tell Nick, but she doesn’t know what she feels or how to express it. The unspoken is the source of a tension that grows and grows and eventually must burst like a bubble rising to the surface. Original format 16mm.
results.description: Freida has something to tell Nick, but she doesn’t know what she feels or how to express it. The unspoken is the source of a tension that grows and grows and eventually must burst like a bubble rising to the surface. Original format 16mm.

results.title: Sex rules
results.brief_description:
Jo and Nik are best friends until they start having to contend with boys and sex. When Jo finds out that her favourite teacher has AIDS, she becomes obsessed with the subject and bases her school artwork on the theme of safe sex. At the same time Nik is becoming involved with a boy and decides to have sex with him without a condom.
Cast features Kirsty McGregor as Jo and Angelica Klages as Nik.

results.title: Road to Alice
results.creator_credit: AFTRS, Frances McGivern and Stavros Kazantzidis
results.brief_description: Jimmy (Noah Taylor) owes Dimitri more money than he can spare. He decides that a holiday would be a better bet. On his travels he meets Louis (Hugo Weaving) and things start to go wrong. Cast also includes Helen Buday, Leone Carmen, Angelo D’Angelo, Emil Minty. Best Short Film, AFI Awards (1992). Original format 16mm/colour.
